properties.name: standard.springboot.error-advisor-enable
properties.description: Server Error Handler Use Global Advisor, default true

properties.name: standard.springboot.error-controller-enable
properties.description: Server Use Global Error Controller, default true

properties.name: standard.springboot.error-trace-lines
properties.description: Server Print Error Trace Lines, default 8

properties.name: standard.springboot.force-http-status
properties.description: Server Api Resfult Http Status force 200, default true

properties.name: standard.springboot.mvc-custom-enable
properties.description: Server Enable Global Json Converter, default true

properties.name: standard.springboot.response-advisor-enable
properties.description: Server Response Handler Use Global Advisor, default true

properties.name: standard.springboot.restful-debug-enable
properties.description: Server Api Resfult Debug Enable, default true

properties.name: standard.springcloud.feign-rpc-sign-enable
properties.description: Feign Rpc sign Enable, default true

properties.name: standard.springcloud.feign-strategy-enable
properties.description: Feign Hystrix Strategy Enable, default true
